name: Tense Conds
description:
This is a rather simple game - just survive as much as you can. But on the arena there may be one or more Conditions (“Conds” for short) which, every 10 seconds, affect the game in some way (either good, like giving you a sword, or bad, like freezing you in an ice block). At least one Cond is always present: the Conditioner, which spawns other Conds every 10 seconds. Part of the fun is trying to find out what each Cond do :-)

You can disable a Cond temporarily by interacting with it (you’re probably playing on the web emulator, so it should be the F key on the keyboard). Bear in mind that Conds go away after a few activations, and by disabling them they will stay there longer.

If you want to submit your high score, you can share it in the comments - just comment with the “Scorecode” displayed on the Game Over screen (it encodes both the Score, the RNG Seed used and some checksum anticheat thingy)

(PS: yes this is a legit NES ROM - the web build is just the em-FCEUX emulator running it)
